animals.info: Herbivorous and primarily graze on vegetation
animals.fact: Male, known as bucks, often grow antlers used for mating displays and combat
animals.description: Elegant and widely distributed mammals known for their graceful appearance and antlered males.

animals.name: Dingo
animals.habitat: Found in diverse Australian ecosystems, including deserts and forests
animals.data: Wild dogs believed to have descended from domesticated dogs
animals.info: Opportunistic hunters and scavengers
animals.fact: They play a significant role in Australian Indigenous culture and mythology
animals.description: Iconic Australian predators known for their adaptability and cultural significance.

animals.name: Dinosaur
animals.habitat: Extinct, but once found in various terrestrial environments worldwide
animals.data: Prehistoric reptiles that ruled the Earth for millions of years
animals.info: Included diverse species, from massive herbivores to agile carnivores
animals.fact: The largest known was Argentinosaurus, a long-necked herbivore
animals.description: A diverse group of ancient reptiles that once dominated the planet.

animals.name: Dog
animals.habitat: Domesticated and found in various human environments worldwide
animals.data: Canine mammals known for their loyalty and companionship
animals.info: Come in various breeds, each with unique characteristics
animals.fact: The Basenji breed is known as the 'barkless'
animals.description: Beloved domesticated animals celebrated for their diverse breeds and roles as loyal companions.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.habitat: Found in oceans and seas worldwide, in both coastal and open water areas
animals.data: Marine mammals known for their intelligence and playful behavior
animals.info: Use echolocation to communicate and locate prey
animals.fact: The bottlenose is one of the most well-known species
animals.description: Highly intelligent marine mammals admired for their social interactions and acrobatic displays.

animals.name: Donkey
animals.habitat: Domesticated and found in various agricultural and rural settings worldwide
animals.data: Equids related to horses and zebras
animals.info: Used for transportation and as working animals
animals.fact: They are known for their resilience and ability to carry heavy loads
animals.description: Domesticated animals valued for their strength and contributions to agriculture and transportation.

animals.name: Dormouse
animals.habitat: Found in woodlands and forests in Europe, Asia, and Africa
animals.data: Small rodents known for their hibernation habits
animals.info: Primarily herbivorous and feed on nuts, fruits, and insects
animals.fact: They are featured in Lewis Carroll's 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland'
animals.description: Small, adorable rodents known for their hibernation behavior and literary connections.

animals.name: Dove
animals.habitat: Found in a variety of habitats, including woodlands, urban areas, and open country
animals.data: Birds known for their gentle cooing calls
animals.info: Often associated with peace and love symbolism
animals.fact: The rock is the wild ancestor of the domestic pigeon
animals.description: Peaceful birds celebrated for their soothing calls and symbolic significance.

animals.name: Dragon
animals.habitat: Legendary creatures from folklore and mythology
animals.data: Mythical reptilian creatures often depicted with wings and the ability to breathe fire
animals.info: Appear in the folklore of cultures worldwide, each with unique characteristics
animals.fact: Have been featured in countless stories, movies, and works of art
animals.description: Mythical creatures known for their role in legends and fantasy tales, often as powerful and fearsome beings.

animals.name: Dragonfly
animals.habitat: Found near freshwater habitats, including ponds, lakes, and streams
animals.data: Insects related to damselflies and known for their agile flight
animals.info: Efficient predators of flying insects
animals.fact: They have a remarkable lifespan and undergo incomplete metamorphosis
animals.description: Agile and predatory insects known for their striking appearance and aerial hunting skills.

animals.name: Duck
animals.habitat: Found in a variety of aquatic environments, including lakes, rivers, and wetlands
animals.data: Waterfowl known for their distinctive bills and webbed feet
animals.info: Omnivorous and feed on aquatic plants, insects, and small fish
animals.fact: Mallards are one of the most common and widely recognized species
animals.description: Waterfowl known for their adaptability to aquatic environments and diverse species found worldwide.

animals.name: Eagle
animals.habitat: Found in various habitats, including mountains, forests, and open plains
animals.data: Birds of prey known for their sharp talons and keen eyesight
animals.info: They are apex predators and often symbolize strength and freedom
animals.fact: The bald eagle is the national bird and symbol of the United States
animals.description: Majestic birds of prey known for their hunting prowess and symbolism.

animals.name: Earthworm
animals.habitat: Found in soil and underground, contributing to soil health
animals.data: Annelid worms important for soil aeration and nutrient cycling
animals.info: They have a cylindrical body with segments and no legs
animals.fact: Charles Darwin studied them and their impact on soil
animals.description: Essential soil-dwelling organisms that play a vital role in maintaining soil fertility.

animals.name: Earwig
animals.habitat: Found in various terrestrial environments, often in dark and damp places
animals.data: Insects known for their distinctive pincer-like appendages
animals.info: They are omnivorous and feed on a variety of organic matter
animals.fact: They are nocturnal and use their pincers for defense and mating displays
animals.description: Insects recognized for their unique pincers and nocturnal habits.

animals.name: Echidna
animals.habitat: Found in Australia and New Guinea, in a range of habitats from forests to deserts
animals.data: Mammals known as monotremes, laying eggs instead of giving birth to live young
animals.info: They are covered in spines and have long, sticky tongues for feeding on ants and termites
animals.fact: One of only two monotreme species in the world
animals.description: Unique egg-laying mammals known for their spiky appearance and specialized feeding adaptations.

animals.name: Eel
animals.habitat: Found in both freshwater and saltwater environments, including rivers, lakes, and oceans
animals.data: Fish with elongated bodies and a snake-like appearance
animals.info: They are known for their catadromous migration, traveling from freshwater to the ocean to spawn
animals.fact: Some species can live for decades before making their long migration to spawn
animals.description: Fascinating fish with complex life cycles and adaptations for different aquatic environments.

animals.name: Egret
animals.habitat: Found in wetlands, marshes, and along the shores of rivers and lakes
animals.data: Wading birds known for their long legs and elegant appearance
animals.info: They are skilled hunters, feeding on fish and other aquatic creatures
animals.fact: Their striking white plumage is a key identifying feature
animals.description: Graceful wading birds known for their beauty and expertise in hunting aquatic prey.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.habitat: Found in a range of habitats, from savannas to forests, in Africa and Asia
animals.data: Largest land mammals with distinctive trunks and tusks
animals.info: They are herbivorous and have complex social structures
animals.fact: The African species is the largest of all elephant species
animals.description: Iconic and intelligent mammals known for their impressive size and cultural significance.

animals.name: Elk
animals.habitat: Found in various North American habitats, including forests and grasslands
animals.data: Large herbivorous mammals related to deer
animals.info: They are known for their impressive antlers and social behavior
animals.fact: Also called wapiti, a word from the Shawnee language
animals.description: Majestic mammals celebrated for their striking appearance and prominent antlers.

animals.name: Emu
animals.habitat: Found in open woodlands, savannas, and grasslands of Australia
animals.data: Large flightless birds known for their speed and long legs
animals.info: They are herbivorous and have distinctive blue-green eggs
animals.fact: The second-largest bird species in the world, after ostriches
animals.description: Iconic Australian birds known for their unique appearance and swift running abilities.

animals.name: Ermine
animals.habitat: Found in northern regions of North America, Europe, and Asia
animals.data: Small mammals belonging to the weasel family
animals.info: They are known for their white winter coat and brown summer fur
animals.fact: Skilled hunters known for their agility
animals.description: Small carnivores with striking seasonal fur changes, adapted to cold environments.

animals.name: Falcon
animals.habitat: Found in various habitats, including deserts, mountains, and open landscapes
animals.data: Birds of prey known for their exceptional speed and hunting skills
animals.info: They have keen eyesight and powerful talons for catching prey
animals.fact: Peregrine falcons are among the fastest animals, reaching speeds of up to 240 mph in a dive
animals.description: Agile and skilled hunters celebrated for their speed and aerial prowess.

animals.name: Felidae
animals.habitat: Found in diverse habitats worldwide, including forests, grasslands, and savannas
animals.data: Family of mammals comprising big and small cats, such as lions, tigers, and domestic cats
animals.info: Carnivorous predators known for their agility and hunting abilities
animals.fact: The cheetah is the fastest land animal, capable of sprinting at incredible speeds
animals.description: A diverse family of carnivorous mammals encompassing a wide range of big and small cats.

animals.name: Ferret
animals.habitat: Domesticated but originally descended from European polecat ancestors
animals.data: Small domesticated carnivorous mammals with a playful and inquisitive nature
animals.info: Often used for hunting and as pets
animals.fact: Their playful behavior earned them the nickname 'carpet sharks'
animals.description: Charming and curious domesticated animals known for their mischievous antics.

animals.name: Finch
animals.habitat: Found in a wide range of habitats, including forests, grasslands, and urban areas
animals.data: Small passerine birds known for their colorful plumage and melodious songs
animals.info: Granivorous, primarily feeding on seeds
animals.fact: Charles Darwin's study of them on the Galpagos Islands contributed to his theory of evolution
animals.description: Small, vibrant birds admired for their beautiful songs and role in evolutionary science.

animals.name: Firefly
animals.habitat: Found in various terrestrial and aquatic environments worldwide
animals.data: Bioluminescent beetles known for their nighttime light displays
animals.info: Use their light to attract mates and communicate
animals.fact: Different species have distinct flash patterns and colors
animals.description: Enchanting insects celebrated for their magical bioluminescent displays.

animals.name: Fish
animals.habitat: Found in diverse aquatic environments, including oceans, rivers, and lakes
animals.data: Aquatic vertebrates with gills and fins, adapted for life in the water
animals.info: Come in various species, shapes, and sizes, with a wide range of adaptations
animals.fact: The ocean sunfish (Mola mola) is one of the heaviest bony fish in the world
animals.description: Diverse aquatic animals vital to ecosystems and human food sources.

animals.name: Flamingo
animals.habitat: Found in wetlands, lakes, and lagoons in Africa, Asia, the Americas, and Europe
animals.data: Tall wading birds known for their distinctive pink plumage and long legs
animals.info: Filter feeders, using their specialized bills to extract food from water
animals.fact: Highly social birds, often seen in large flocks
animals.description: Striking wading birds admired for their vibrant pink feathers and elegant appearance.

animals.name: Flea
animals.habitat: Found on mammals and birds, especially in their fur or feathers
animals.data: Tiny parasitic insects known for their jumping ability
animals.info: Feed on the blood of their hosts and can transmit diseases
animals.fact: Known for their incredible jumping power, relative to their size
animals.description: Small but notorious parasites that can be troublesome for animals and humans alike.

animals.name: Fly
animals.habitat: Found in diverse terrestrial and aquatic environments worldwide
animals.data: Insects with two wings and a highly maneuverable flight capability
animals.info: Diverse and include many species with varying lifestyles
animals.fact: Some species play essential roles as pollinators, while others are pests
animals.description: Agile insects known for their flight skills and wide ecological roles.

animals.name: Flyingfish
animals.habitat: Found in warm oceanic waters, especially in the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian Oceans
animals.data: Fish with specialized pectoral fins that allow them to glide above the water's surface
animals.info: Use their gliding ability to escape from predators
animals.fact: Some can cover distances of several meters during their flights
animals.description: Remarkable marine creatures known for their unique adaptation for escaping predators.

animals.name: Fowl
animals.habitat: Domesticated in various regions worldwide for meat and eggs
animals.data: Birds belonging to the order Galliformes, including chickens, turkeys, and quails
animals.info: Commonly raised for human consumption and as poultry
animals.fact: Chickens are the most numerous and widely distributed species
animals.description: Domesticated birds that provide a significant source of meat and eggs for humans.

animals.name: Fox
animals.habitat: Found in a range of terrestrial habitats, including forests, grasslands, and urban areas
animals.data: Carnivorous mammals known for their intelligence and adaptability
animals.info: Omnivorous and have a diverse diet, including small mammals, birds, and fruits
animals.fact: Known for their bushy tails and cunning hunting techniques
animals.description: Clever and versatile mammals celebrated for their adaptability and sly behavior.

animals.name: Frog
animals.habitat: Found in various aquatic and terrestrial environments, from rainforests to deserts
animals.data: Amphibians known for their leaping ability and semi-aquatic lifestyle
animals.info: Have permeable skin and lay eggs in water, undergoing metamorphosis
animals.fact: The golden poison dart frog is one of the most toxic animals on Earth
animals.description: Fascinating amphibians recognized for their unique life cycle and environmental sensitivity.
